pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One: What Will Pop Out of the Kangaroo? Think About It On You-roo-wn! Now, It's Aruto or Nothing!! (2019, Hyper Battle Video)$(br2)Used to access Zero-One's $(l:zero_one/riders/zero_one#hopping_kangaroo)Hopping Kangaroo$(/l) form
Obtained by using $(l:zero_one/items/blank_progrisekey)Blank Progrisekeys$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/hiden_3d_printer)HIDEN 3D Printer$(/l)
